messages.message: I was very happy to hear your speech before singing "Beijing welcome you " at your Beijing concert. I am really glad that you can realize your dream. I admire your high vision and broad mind even more.

messages.message: My first concert in China, it seemed so unreal.   The whole experience is unforgettable.  So many first time things, getting inside of the Birdâ€˜s Nest, attending Shengmi support event and meeting Haimi from North America Fan Clubâ€¦Shenshen, we will always support you.â¤ï¸

Dear Shen Shen, coming to Bird Nest to see your concert is like a dream came true.  I can't help crying when you sang the Big Fish with the big fish swimming next to you.  I'm so proud of you that you can overcome all the odds, the hurdles, and all the impossibilities!!  YOU MAKE ITğŸŠğŸŠ  I feel so blessed that I can witness this important moment with youğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­  Wish you all the BESTğŸ‰ğŸ‰  Love you akwaysâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸

As a senoir lady in my 70s, I encountered significant challenges traveling 8,000 miles across the Pacific Ocean from Texas, USA to Beijing for your concert for the first time. However, seeing you perform made the entire experience worthwhile.

é‚£å¤©æ™šä¸ŠçœŸçš„æ„Ÿè§‰é¸Ÿå·¢æ˜¯ä¸ªâ€œå·¢â€ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¹Œæ‰˜é‚¦ã€ç†æƒ³ä¹¡ï¼Œç››äº†ç››å¤§ç¾ä¸½çš„æ¢¦ã€‚åœ¨â€œå·¢â€é‡Œäººä»¬è¿½æº¯ã€ååˆã€åˆ›é€ å›å¿†ï¼Œå¹¶å®Œæˆäº†åºå¤§çš„æƒ…æ„Ÿäº¤æ¢ã€‚æƒ³èµ·ä¹‹å‰åœ¨å‰§é™¢é‡Œå¬åˆ°ï¼š"Leave your troubles outside. In here life is beautiful!"â€”â€”æ·±æ·±ä½•å°ä¸ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé€ æ¢¦è€…ï¼Œè™½ç„¶æ–¹å¼ä¸åŒï¼Œä½†ä»–çœŸçš„åšåˆ°å•¦ã€‚

Attending Zhou Shenâ€™s 9.20HZ concert at Beijingâ€™s iconic Birdâ€™s Nest on September 21st and 22nd, 2024, was an unforgettable experience. The significance of the venueâ€”the Birdâ€™s Nest, a symbol of unity and dreams from the 2008 Olympicsâ€”added deep meaning to the event. The stage production, crafted by the Beijing Olympic team, was truly world-class, seamlessly blending artistry and technology. One of the most breathtaking moments was the appearance of the giant whale, which floated above the audience and created a magical, dreamlike atmosphere. When Zhou Shen sang â€œBeijing Welcomes You,â€ the entire stadium was filled with warmth and pride, uniting everyone in song and spirit. This concert was not just a musical performance, but a celebration of hope, connection, and the power of music. I feel incredibly grateful to have witnessed such a meaningful and inspiring event.
